i think having some kind of tool tip when you hover over a UI element that displays the shortcuts related to its use could be very helpful, i have working in Maya for a while now and one of the few things that i really lie is that functionality.  (i have left a example in image below)

One thing that i remember from being a new player in KSP 1 was slowly finding out all the short cuts, i believe having something like this could be a non intrusive way of teaching newer players all the shortcuts and make the UI more navigable.

something like this but with our the text discription
Yes, this I think this would be a good addition.  Ideally with an easily accessible toggle (perhaps a button on screen) to  enable us to easily turn them on again if disabled.
